title: Ep 206: What It's Like to Have Autism - Interview with Alex Lowrey
description: Its time to hear from someone who has been diagnosed with autism what life is like.  Alex Lowery joins us to talk about growing up with autism - about the heightened sensations, the frustrations of not being understood and what has helped him get to where he is today.  At 20, Alex gives talks about his life.  I think you'll get some fascinating insights.
